title: Trade-Offs
description:
Ray Christian, Alexandra Anagnostopoulos, Jane Wallis and Mary Eden share stories about butt shrapnel, a man who says, "Me and my fam," libido-killing antidepressants, and a sister's illness.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Atomic Drum Assembly, Jane Wallis, Mary Eden, Real Estate, Kevin Allison, Belle and Sebastian, Ray Christian, Alexandra Anagnostopoulos)
